import { formatPrice, getProductPrice } from "../pages/helpers"; export default function CheckoutSidebar(props) { let totalAmount = 0, discount = 0, tax = 0, deliveryCharges = 0, couponDiscount = 0, totalPay = 0; props.cart.forEach(pro => { totalAmount += pro.ragularPrice * pro.cartQuantity totalPay += getProductPrice(pro) * pro.cartQuantity discount = totalAmount - totalPay }) return (

Apply Coupon

Appy

Price Details

{ discount !== 0 && } { couponDiscount !== 0 && }
Total MRP {formatPrice(totalAmount)}
Discount on MRP {formatPrice(discount)}
Coupon Discount {formatPrice(discount)}
Tax {tax ? formatPrice(tax) : "Includede"}
Delivery Charges {deliveryCharges ? formatPrice(deliveryCharges) : "Free"}
Total Amount USD 9796.57
) }
